name: Max Steven
description: I am a potential optimist and I do love the very simple things in life, they actually teach me how to live. I love to be around like minds, chilling and talking about every aspect of life. I’m an advocate of love but not senseless about it. Anyways, everyone else has his/her own understanding of it. I’m free, so open that you can see through my transparency. Although we write a lot of things about us, doesn’t mean we are actually that way or may not translate into real life. Feel free to ask me anything.
